title: Looking for bidding partner for Leland's Lot # 91: T206 Rare Back Collection (7)
author: Howe’s Hunter

posts.post_title: Looking for bidding partner for Leland's Lot # 91: T206 Rare Back Collection (7)
posts.post_content:
Only interested in the two Hindu cards with Howe's stamp on them, wondered if there might be someone on board interested in the other five so we (I) could bid higher in hopes of winning. Let me know if interested. Thanks. Ed
Helps if you put in the link to the auction. Sorry about that ...
[url]https://auction.lelands.com/bids/bidplace?itemid=93609[/url]
